title: Found a Counter to Quinn top that is Melee
body:
It's Fiora, Max W every time she tries to poke you with harrier just parry and laugh.
You can juke out her blind by using first Q on minions and than Q to her. She will most likely panic than Vault auto you.
Parry that said auto and win the trade because your Q+Parry > Just her Vault damage alone
+Fedora Ult is stupid once you get rolling
